        c + d = n ∧ r n = |c - d * Real.sqrt 3|) ∧
        (∀ c d : ℤ, (c ≥ 0 ∧ d ≥ 0 ∧ c + d = n) → |c - d * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ r n))

    have h₅ := hr 2 (by norm_num)

        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by norm_num),
          Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by norm_num), sq_nonneg (c - d * Real.sqrt 3),
          sq_nonneg (c + d * Real.sqrt 3), sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt 3 - 1), Real.sqrt_nonneg 3,
          sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt 3 + 1), Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by norm_num)]
    simp_all
  exact ⟨⟨h₁, h₂⟩, fun g ⟨hg₁, hg₂⟩ => by
    have h₃ : ∀ n : ℤ, n ≥ 1 → r n ≤ g := hg₂
    have h₄ : r 1 ≤ g := h₃ 1 (by norm_num)
    have h₅ : putnam_1988_b3_solution ≤ g := by
      simp_all [putnam_1988_b3_solution]
      <;>
        norm_num [abs_le] at * <;>
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by norm_num),
          Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by norm_num), sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt 3 - 1),
          Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt 3 + 1)]
    exact h₅⟩
